forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Cloudy, with a low around 26. North wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 7am, then a chance of snow and patchy fog. Cloudy, with a high near 33. North wind 3 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

weather_report:
As the night deepens in Boston, a gentle chill envelops the city, hinting at the frost that will greet the dawn. The sky is dressed in a shroud of clouds, with the faint possibility of snow weaving its quiet magic overnight. At this hour, the streets are still, and the city glimmers under a muted palette of artificial lights, promising a soft, almost dreamlike quality as people retreat into warm spaces, cups of something hot in hand.

Come Saturday, the wintery embrace of possibility continues, as forecasters whisper of patchy fog and the lingering chance of light snow. The day will unfold beneath a muted canopy, perfect for cozy indoor pursuits, perhaps visiting a beloved café or seeking solace in the pages of a good book. Attire will lean toward warmth; thick layers, sturdy boots, and a scarf to wrap around against the brisk air will serve you well. As you navigate the streets, the chill will be most apparent but comforting in its own right, inviting you to partake in the city's quieter charms. Whether it’s a leisurely stroll through the hushed streets or a moment spent people-watching from a window seat, Boston will reward you with its understated beauty on this chilly day.
